Level 53
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 53
By Y.K. TAN on Monday, May 31, 2004 - 07:57 pm:

Stage 53

Jump down, while holding on the right button when the ghost move down to obtain the key as well as dodging the ghost. If you want to win this stage fast, just kill yourself and repeat, this time entering the door to win!

If not....just go grab that cox hat(for 1 extra life) and kill yourself and exit the stage!

You can win this stage without losing a life, but it takes longer time and more skill, of course.
